column6:
The secret history of the House of M universe continues as Luke Cage's Avengers battle Shang-Chi's Dragons...Officer Misty Knight inflitrates the Avengers to take them down from within...and Thunderbird's FBI task force, The Brotherhood, recruits a new Sapien member: ex-Marine Frank Castle, aka The Punisher! And tragedy strikes as an Avenger heads toward death!,2007,12
Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | writer:Christos Gage | colorist:Laura Martin | penciller (cover):Mike Perkins | letterer:Rus Wooton
